summary: Email exchange between an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York and an unidentified recipient, scheduling a call to provide a rundown before the recipient speaks with another unidentified person. The email includes an attachment described as background on their thinking.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, working in the Southern District of New York, is coordinating a call to provide information before the recipient speaks with another person.

events.title: Scheduled call between AUSA and recipient
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney emails to schedule a call for 9:30 AM on January 31, 2020, to provide background information before the recipient speaks with another person.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: The document is an email exchange dated January 30-31, 2020, involving an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The purpose of the communication is to schedule a call to provide a rundown before the recipient speaks with another unidentified person.
An attachment is referenced, described as background on their thinking, but its content is not included in the provided text.
